title: Carrot Cake Cupcakes
ingredients: ['150g self raising flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1/4 teaspoon cinnamon', '1/4 teaspoon nutmeg', '125g softened butter', '125g brown sugar', '75g grated carrot', '2 eggs', '100g full fat or low fat cream cheese', '2 tbsp icing sugar', 'a few drops lemon flavouring or lemon rind']
